text:
Great work on the QA report! I see you mention `chaos_resilience_test.rs` with 39 tests covering malformed IPC, token stream interruptions, resource limits, etc.

Did you also complete Task #4 (Chaos Testing)? If so, can you mark it as completed? The task shows as pending but your report mentions the full chaos test suite exists and passes.

Also - what's the status on Task #3 (Tokenizer Integration)? We haven't heard from tokenizer-engineer in a while.
summary: Clarifying chaos test status and tokenizer progress
